alert.note: Alert for Western Magic Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 08 at 1:03PM MST until December 09 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 PM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches, except 2 to 4 inches over the mountains. * WHERE...The Magic Valley north of Interstate 84, including Gooding and Jerome. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 5 PM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions along all transportation corridors in the advised area. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Morning temperatures will support rapid snow accumulation on road surfaces.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
